name: vue-test-utils-mocha-example
description: Example project using mocha-webpack and vue-test-utils
author: Evan You <yyx990803@gmail.com>

scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text mocha-webpack --webpack-config webpack.config.js --require test/setup.js test/**/*.spec.js
scripts.testwatch: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text mocha-webpack --watch --webpack-config webpack.config.js --require test/setup.js test/**/*.spec.js
